story_arceus_05_07000/2401_1101_0100_20: On the day of the Arceus Cup...
story_arceus_05_07000/2401_1101_0200_20: Ethan and Silver’s showdown finally arrived.
story_arceus_05_07000/2401_1001_0300_10: You’re not wearing your sygna suit?
story_arceus_05_07000/2401_1001_0400_10:
You wore it when we were battling
Team Rocket.
story_arceus_05_07000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Yeah...but I’ve got a lot of memories from
Johto of battling you in this outfit.
story_arceus_05_07000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Let’s show them what we trained for,
Ho-Oh!
story_arceus_05_07000/2401_1001_1600_10:
Not bad, Silver! But we won’t go down
that easy!
story_arceus_05_07000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Listen, you. You won only because my
Pokémon were weak.
story_arceus_05_07000/2401_1001_2200_10:
(I realized it was I who was weak—not my
Pokémon.)
story_arceus_05_07000/2401_1001_2400_10: I never used to think about what’s “right.”
story_arceus_05_07000/2401_1001_2500_10:
But because of you, I started doing things the
right way—to beat you fair and square!
story_arceus_05_07000/2401_1001_2600_10:
So if there’s anything righteous or pure in
my heart...
story_arceus_05_07000/2401_1001_2700_10: this is where I’ll find it—battling YOU!
story_arceus_05_07000/2401_1001_2900_10: just how pure and righteous our hearts are!
story_arceus_05_07000/2401_1001_3200_10: Huh. So this is an arc suit.
story_arceus_05_07000/2401_1001_3300_10:
My connection with Ho-Oh... I can feel it in
my heart.
story_arceus_05_07000/2401_1001_3500_10:
I’ll make use of this power. Even if it comes
from a deity!
story_arceus_05_07000/2401_1001_3700_10: Can you last a little longer?
